item.title: Acupuncture may alleviate nocturia in men treated for prostate cancer
item.description: Acupuncture may reduce nocturia in patients treated for prostate cancer, according to a research letter published online in JAMA Oncology.

item.title: Pepto Bismol may not prevent traveler's diarrhea, new study finds
item.description: Pepto Bismol is a go-to stomach remedy, but a new study suggests it might not help prevent diarrhea during international travel.
